text: I think maybe you should do a screen capture tutorial!
Ok, so yesterday, July 28th we had a workshop at the Arroz Studios in wonderful Lisbon! We had a hands on workshop where we started with an online app called
We decided to make a t-shirt and Erica drew one using an ipad. We exported it as an .obj file and then used a free program called MagicaVoxels (

), where we polished off the shape created in monstermash and then decorated with colour. Everyone who wanted to, had a hand in creating the final design on the t-shirt. After we were all happy with what was created, I minted it on
using the matic side chain, which is found on metamask. We minted 20 copies and I then distributed them to the participants (or, I should say I am distributing them now!)

🥰 yw. Tbh I'd go for it myself if I felt I had the bandwidth to get something on within 3 days 🙈.

In general, I think the basic premise of: 

community needs public good -> Community members use defi/pos to gain funds + a DAO to manage funds + a social token/NFT's for destination of "who is an active community member?"

messages.text: Hi Rebecca i believe there is an expansion plan being currently formulated...details to follow on Monday i’m told...the disassociation with Arroz Criativo DAO is to facilitate this expansion it seems...

text:
I'll give you an update on Monday. Happy to do a call or just send you the info.

Basically would like to open the scheme up to more artists and potentially more associations with time. This is easier if the scheme is not so tightly associated with Arroz.

messages.text: Send info to you as well as updating with new open call details etc in the forum.

text: ! yes, the initial plan was to expand the project to other physical communities and to support more artists outside Arroz' scope. But if it's not the best way to do it and if it's better to be DAO-to-DAO (Arroz > Planting AIR) or other option I'm sure we (Sam, Mette, Steven and I) could change, edit or adapt the proposal. And to provide a retrospective report with more detailed information sounds reasonable and fair for sure 👌

messages.text: Thanks, Juliana, Mette, and Tolga. If this is the plan to expand outside of the scope of Arroz with this residency then there needs to be a lot more included in this proposal to indicate that - with partnerships/collaborations that will help take the program outside of Arroz and clear intention around the parameters of who the open call would include in more detail than what's been stated so far. Looking forward to learning more on the Forum so it's publicly available to the community - especially since many/some of the community members may be your intended audience of this residency depending - and/or on Monday. Based on what I'm seeing so far it still seems too early to have this residency step out from Arroz's umbrella just yet.

⚡️Hey Arroz Criativo! APN has some initiatives in the making and we would like to share this call for submissions with you.👇

We are looking for artists who would like to team up with us to collectively deliver an immersive artistic experience for a well-known European festival. As such, we are currently crowdsourcing proposals for digital artwork, interactive installations, festival sculptures and/or projections.

We have been offered  a dome, aprox. 15m in diameter,within the festival as an exhibition environment.
In addition to leveraging the Dome exhibition space provided by the festival organizer's, we welcome concepts that make use of the natural characteristics of the festival site, which features a lake, many trees and permanent sculptures / installations that could be leveraged for projections, sound installations, VJs and/or 360 projections. 

👉 You can read the full brief, next steps and *manifest your interest* thro this form

until the 25th of October.
 🕐We will be looking into the applications and reach out by the 26th of Oct to the submissions which best fit the festival concept (innovative, nature, immersive) and request an full artistic proposal to submit until the 1st of November (artwork details and intention, budget, details for setup)


Looking forward to hearing from you! 🍀
